definitions.definition: The quality or state of being sick or diseased ; illness.
Nausea ; qualmishness ; as, sickness of stomach.
The analogical misuse of a rarer or marked grammatical case in the place of a more common or unmarked case.

main_definition: The quality or state of being sick or diseased ; illness.
secondary_definitions: Nausea ; qualmishness ; as, sickness of stomach.
( linguistics ) The analogical misuse of a rarer or marked grammatical case in the place of a more common or unmarked case.
